title: Google\Cloud\AutoMl\V1beta1\TablesModelColumnInfo
name: TablesModelColumnInfo
description:
An information specific to given column and Tables Model, in context of the Model and the predictions created by it.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.TablesModelColumnInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.column_spec_name
params.description: Output only. The name of the ColumnSpec describing the column. Not populated when this proto is outputted to BigQuery.

params.name: data.column_display_name
params.description: Output only. The display name of the column (same as the display_name of its ColumnSpec).

params.name: data.feature_importance
params.description: Output only. When given as part of a Model (always populated): Measurement of how much model predictions correctness on the TEST data depend on values in this column. A value between 0 and 1, higher means higher influence. These values are normalized - for all input feature columns of a given model they add to 1. When given back by Predict (populated iff [feature_importance param][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.PredictRequest.params] is set) or Batch Predict (populated iff [feature_importance][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.PredictRequest.params] param is set): Measurement of how impactful for the prediction returned for the given row the value in this column was. Specifically, the feature importance specifies the marginal contribution that the feature made to the prediction score compared to the baseline score. These values are computed using the Sampled Shapley method.

methods.description:

methods.name: getFeatureImportance
methods.description:
Output only. When given as part of a Model (always populated): Measurement of how much model predictions correctness on the TEST data depend on values in this column. A value between 0 and 1, higher means higher influence. These values are normalized - for all input feature columns of a given model they add to 1.

When given back by Predict (populated iff [feature_importance param][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.PredictRequest.params] is set) or Batch Predict (populated iff [feature_importance][google.cloud.automl.v1beta1.PredictRequest.params] param is set): Measurement of how impactful for the prediction returned for the given row the value in this column was. Specifically, the feature importance specifies the marginal contribution that the feature made to the prediction score compared to the baseline score. These values are computed using the Sampled Shapley method.

Generated from protobuf field float feature_importance = 3;
